name: Vampirat
description:
Vampirat

My submission for Minijam 118
Also my first game jam submission ever

The jellies have taken over the sewer from the rats! By sheer randomness, one rat discovered that blood will dissolve jellies. Freshly bitten after a day of scavenging, you, the Vampirat, have to put your vampire powers to use by using blood to get rid of the jellies and bring the rats back to their homes.

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys to move
Hold Spacebar to become a rat-bat
Left click to shoot blood
